citation.case_name: Hammond v. Connecticut Mut. Life Ins. Co.

html:
150 U.S. 633

14 S.Ct. 236

37 L.Ed. 1206

HAMMOND et al.
v.
CONNECTICUT MUT. LIFE INS. CO. HAMMOND et al. v. GORDON et al.

Nos. 937 and 938.

December 18, 1893.

1

[Statement of Case from pages 633-636 intentionally omitted]

2

John B. Henderson, for the motion.

3

Daniel T. Jewett and Leverett Bell, opposed.

4

THE CHIEF JUSTICE.

5

The writs of error are dismissed, upon the authority of Hammond v. Johnston, 142 U. S. 73, 12 Sup. Ct. 141.

*636 Mr. J.B. Henderson, for the defendants in error.

Mr. D.T. Jewett and Mr. Leverett Bell opposing.
